title: website: new subrepos missing golang.org/x pages
body:
The new sync and time subrepos are missing the golang.org/x/FOO pages:

```
bradfitz@laptop test$ go get golang.org/x/sync/...
package golang.org/x/sync/...: unrecognized import path "golang.org/x/sync/..." (parsing golang.org/x/sync: http: read on closed response body)
bradfitz@laptop test$ go get golang.org/x/time/...
package golang.org/x/time/...: unrecognized import path "golang.org/x/time/..." (parsing golang.org/x/time: http: read on closed response body)
bradfitz@laptop test$ curl golang.org/x/time
404 page not found
bradfitz@laptop test$ curl golang.org/x/sync
404 page not found
```
